AND INTEREST_BIG_CODE LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'

SELECT G.GROUP_NO, G.GROUP_NAME, G.GROUP_PICTURE, G.GROUP_ADDRESS, G.GROUP_GRADE_CODE, G.MAX_MEMBER,G.INTEREST_BIG_CODE, G.ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_MEMBER WHERE GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) MEMBERCNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) POSTCNT FROM GROUPS G WHERE GROUP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND GROUP_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{place}||'%' AND OPEN_SETTING not like '%PRIVATE%'
AND INTEREST_BIG_CODE LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'
OR (GROUP_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{regardlessArea}||'%') AND INTEREST_BIG_CODE LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'
AND GROUP_ADDRESS NOT LIKE '지역무관'
ORDER BY MEMBERCNT DESC, G.ENROLL_DATE DESC, POSTCNT DESC
ORDER BY POSTCNT DESC, G.ENROLL_DATE DESC, MEMBERCNT DESC
